segments.text: I see the woman standing there, drying a plate so methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink's overflowing, water everywhere she stands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't realize the puddle's growing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware she is of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are climbing and reaching without supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool could collapse under the boy any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, but it feels so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules by sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside makes the inside seem even lonelier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she'll slip and get hurt in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's looking out for each other here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets expose everything so vulnerably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart with its potential for mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, caught in this oblivious routine.
segments.speaker: PAR
